AMECard.Name: Instance Search (Matching)
AMECard.Definition: Determine if a video segment contains an object instance (building, logo, etc) or scene from a specified database. The instances may be depicted differently and may only be partly visible.

Input.Name: Database
Input.Definition: An database with instances to be searched for

Input.Name: StructuredRegionOfInterest
Input.Definition: A region in which to perform the detection.

Output.Name: SearchReport
Output.Definition: An output file containing the instances found and the corresponding spatiotemporal segments
